name: TheTruthTeller
description:
How to Install?
Unzip and open v100r1908311330/TruthTellersProject.exe and play

Plot : You have escaped from the liars city to live in a lonely house, But liars have found you, and you have to defend the truth

Credits:

Design: Gabanm28

Program: CptBolee

everything is made from scratch using Unity3D, Blender, Paint.net and Notepad++

only sounds are downloaded from freesound.org
